settings.collection_left_benefit_desc: Keeps your loved one safer; quickly learn your vehicle's location and location history with mobile phone app
Saves the family caregiver time and money: battery lasts for up to two years with no charging
Reduces caregiver stress: easy and flexible to use, easy to conceal inside vehicle, no mobile phone inside vehicle needed

settings.collection_right_benefit_desc: Keeps the care recipient safer; brings peace of mind to family caregiver
Frees the family caregiver to tend to household tasks, while caring for loved one
Allows loved one to do daily activities; no impact or restrictions

settings.testimonial_desc: I haven’t seen anything else like this. The Alerta Patch and Wedge makes a lot of sense for caregivers who are at home with their loved ones living with dementia. It’s impossible to keep an eye on someone 24/7.  So, it’s crucial that a  care partner knows if their loved one leaves the house or goes to an unsafe area, like the top of the basement stairs.
settings.testimonial_name:
- Rachael Wonderlin
Founder, Dementia By Day

settings.feature__description:
Helps you ensure
that your employees are taking
the most direct routes to their
locations.
By having documentation of your employees’ location, you can protect yourself from liability and allegations.
You can ensure that your employees are where they are supposed to be, providing quality care.

settings.intro_subtitle: Alerta Find is a GPS that monitors the car it is placed in.
settings.intro_description: It helps you determine if your trainers are traveling the most efficient routes, save money on mileage & employee pay, and confirm the duration of visits.
settings.solution_title:
Pay once,
Get 4 years of Battery Life
settings.solution_description:
Alerta Find has no installation.
Simply activate it and place it in the vehicle you need to monitor.

Alerta Find’s battery lasts over 4 years without a charge so you never have to worry.
settings.testimonial_name:
- A Home Health Care Franchise Owner 
Virginia Beach, VA
settings.testimonial_description:
“I personally see a great potential for this unit to be used to cut cost.

Alerta has a genuine interest in creating and putting out the best products and service possible”
settings.contact_us_subtitle: For information about Alerta Find and corporate pricing, please contact us using the form below or by dialing 833-392-6337.

settings.dropdown_product_image_alt: Alerta Find : GPS car Tracker for dementia, seniors and Alzheimer's

settings.hero_desc: Alerta products help to keep people suffering from dementia comfortable and safe, while bringing the family caregiver peace of mind.

settings.support_product_guide_desc_1: To activate the Patch & Wedge, check out the “Get Started” card and “User Guide”.
settings.support_product_guide_desc_2: Chat or call us! We’re here, waiting for you.

settings.support_product_guide_desc_1:
For help activating your Alerta Find, just give us a call.

We’re ready to talk to you 24/7!

Alerta Flash is easy to use and easy to program.

Download the User Guide to learn more.

settings.support_slider_title:
How can we help you 
today?

settings.about_slider_image_alt: grandmother showing her family album to her granddaughter while they sitting outdoors with Alerta patch
settings.about_slider_title:
The mission of Track Patch 1 Corporation is
to help enable aging‑in‑place with dignity.
settings.about_slider_desc: We strive to offer innovative products for the family caregiver and for the care recipient suffering from dementia. Our offering allows the caregiver to tend to the demands of family and a busy household, with the assurance that his/her loved one is safe, nearby, and able to do normal activities.

settings.benefit_title: EASILY KNOW THE DATE AND TIME WITH TALKING TOUCHSCREEN
settings.benefit_desc_1: Simply tap the screen to hear the weekday, time, and date.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Eliminate your loved one’s confusion or frustration about what time it is.

settings.benefit_title: MANAGE YOUR DAILY SCHEDULE WITH MEDICATION REMINDERS AND ALARMS
settings.benefit_desc_2: For medication reminder, simply turn-on “medication reminder” in set-alarm menu.

settings.benefit_title: CUSTOMIZABLE: PROGRAM ALERTA FLASH FOR YOUR PREFERENCES, WITH EASY TOUCHSCREEN
settings.benefit_desc_1: Define periods of day based on time intervals that work for your schedule.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Choose from four display colors (black, white, red, blue).
settings.benefit_desc_3: Adjust screen brightness, alarm, and voice sound by sliding finger on touchscreen to fit your environment.

settings.benefit_title: ENJOY IMAGES OF PEOPLE, PLACES, AND THINGS THAT YOU LOVE
settings.benefit_desc_1: Alerta Flash is also a digital picture frame.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Simply copy your photographs to the mini-USB memory stick (included) and insert into back of device.

settings.summary: Tap the screen to hear the date, day, and time
Eight programmable alarms or medication time alarms
Customize display colors for your preferences
Free 512 MB memory stick for auto-scrolling your favorite photos

settings.product_desc: The friendly clock that helps manage your day.  It’s a clock and a digital frame to auto-scroll photos.

settings.pricing_refill_desc: (Receive Patch Refill Kit every month / quarter / half-year)

settings.product_benefit_title: Safety for the care recipient; peace of mind for the caregiver.

settings.product_benefit_discription: Passive device; no manual trigger needed to alarm.
Patch is always comfortable on body; cannot be removed like lanyards or wristbands.
Radio-frequency technology, no dependency on cellular towers or satellites; works inside the house.
Reliable, strong continuous signal in any position.

settings.product_benefit_title: Freedom for family caregiver to tend to household tasks, while caring for loved one.

settings.product_benefit_discription: Range of 65 to 95 feet is optimal for house or apartment, enabling aging-in-place at home.
Loud alarm, so direct line-of-sight to care recipient is not needed.
Alerta is self-contained; it’s easy to use and there is no extra cost for additional devices, or cellular or Wi-Fi service.

settings.product_benefit_title: No impact to daily activities for loved one.

settings.product_benefit_discription: Patch is light, small, with gentle adhesive– “you don’t even know it’s there.”
Patch is water-resistant, so it’s Ok to bathe or shower.
Wedge is handheld and movable– Alerta goes wherever the caregiver and care recipient need to go.

settings.product_slider_title: Safety for the care recipient; peace of mind for the caregiver
Freedom for family caregiver to tend to household tasks, while caring for loved one.
settings.product_slider_subtitle: Line of sight to care recipient not needed

settings.product_slider_title: Alerta does not stop your loved one from living life.
settings.product_slider_subtitle: Alerta Patch is light, small, discreet, comfortable

settings.product_title: Alerta Patch & Wedge: the most effective wearable proximity monitor
settings.product_tagline:
Caring for Your Loved One
Caring for the Caregiver

settings.benefit_title: QUICKLY LEARN YOUR VEHICLE’S LOCATION & HISTORY
settings.benefit_desc_1: Reliable continuous GPS technology; wireless solution with no range limitation.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Indicates vehicle location to within three feet.
settings.benefit_desc_3: Easy to use mobile app displays location history and location in-transit or parked.
settings.benefit_desc_4: “Find” key shows vehicle position and speed on map.

settings.benefit_desc_1: No worries about or time wasted charging battery: Find's battery lasts for up to two years.
settings.benefit_desc_2: No expense on special tools or technician time to install– just place the Find where you want it.

settings.benefit_title: You’re never alone: support always available
settings.benefit_desc_1: Customer service 24/7 by dedicated national support team

settings.benefit_title: Reduce STRESS: EASY AND FLEXIBLE TO USE
settings.benefit_desc_1: Alerta Find is easily hidden in vehicle.  It is smaller than a credit card.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Alerta Find weighs less than three pennies. It can be placed anywhere in vehicle and used in different vehicles.
settings.benefit_desc_3: Alerta Find is ready to use out of the box– just turn it on.

settings.summary: Tracking reports via text message or email

settings.product_title: STAY SAFE WITH REVOLUTIONARY VEHICLE TRACKING

settings.benefit_desc_1: Portable: move from location to location depending on your needs.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Easily record voice message (max two minutes) for any environment with built-in microphone and the push of a button.

settings.benefit_title: PERFORMANCE: IMPROVE QUALITY OF LIFE AND SAFETY FOR YOUR LOVED ONE
settings.benefit_desc_1: Broadcast safety messages near staircases; record reminders for daily life in friendly voice that is known to your loved one.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Perfect motion-sensing range for home,  up to 13-feet, 120-degrees.
settings.benefit_desc_3: Ball-and-socket installation mounting allows for 360-degree rotation.
settings.benefit_desc_4: Clearly hear message play-back: speaker power 1 Watt.

settings.benefit_desc_1: Easy to install with screws or double-sided tape; no expensive tools or technicians.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Low power consumption (three AAA batteries included!).

settings.spec_desc: Power Supply: DC3V-5V or three AAA batteries
Current: standby <90 microamps; recording <40 milliamps; playing <200 milliamps
Detection Range: up to 4 meters or 13 feet, 120° angle

settings.summary: Broadcast safety reminders, friendly messages, or “stay healthy” prompts
Easily record voice messages with the push of a button.
Optimized range to sense distance: 13 feet, 120-degress.

settings.product_desc: Alerta Voice records and plays-back your messages, so you can always say the right thing to your loved one, if you're not there.

settings.benefit_desc_1: Portable: move from location to location depending on your needs.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Change and manage sound or voice message audio files for different environments.
settings.benefit_desc_3: Adjustable volume (seven levels; max 105 dB): hear chime across many rooms.
settings.benefit_desc_4: Two power modes: batteries or direct Micro USB.

settings.benefit_desc_1: Easy to install with screws or double-sided tape; no expensive tools or technicians.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Low power consumption (three AAA batteries included).

settings.benefit_desc_1: Fits anywhere, on small or large doors or cupboards

settings.spec_desc: Power Supply: three AAA batteries or micro - USB (DC 3V - 5V)
Current: standby door closed <1 uA ; standby door open <23 mA; playing <120 mA (VDC 4.5)

settings.usage_description:
Signal opening on
high-risk closets or cabinets

settings.summary: Customizable for different voice messages or alarm notification sounds.  Just copy audio files to device memory.
Adjustable volume: seven settings.  Speaker can be heard across the entire house.

settings.product_desc: Alerta Chime is a door-open sensor, so you’ll always know your loved one’s “ins-and-outs.”

settings.benefit_title: SAFETY FOR THE CARE RECIPIENT; PEACE OF MIND FOR THE CAREGIVER.
settings.benefit_desc_1: Patch is always comfortable on body; cannot be removed like lanyards or wristbands.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Passive device; no manual trigger needed to alarm.
settings.benefit_desc_3: Radio-frequency technology, no dependency on cellular towers or satellites; works inside the house.
settings.benefit_desc_4: Reliable, strong continuous signal in any position.

settings.benefit_title: FREEDOM FOR FAMILY CAREGIVER TO TEND TO HOUSEHOLD TASKS, WHILE CARING FOR LOVED ONE.
settings.benefit_desc_1: Range of 65 to 95 feet is optimal for house or apartment, enabling aging-in-place at home.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Loud alarm, so direct line-of-sight to care recipient is not needed.
settings.benefit_desc_3: Alerta is self-contained; it’s easy to use and there is no extra cost for additional devices, or cellular or Wi-Fi service.

settings.benefit_title: NO IMPACT TO DAILY ACTIVITIES FOR LOVED ONE.
settings.benefit_desc_1: Wedge is handheld and movable– Alerta goes wherever the caregiver and care recipient go.
settings.benefit_desc_2: Patch is light, small, with gentle adhesive– “you don’t even know it’s there.”
settings.benefit_desc_3: Patch is water-resistant, so it’s Ok to bathe or shower.
settings.benefit_desc_5: Reliable performance during any activity: sitting, sleeping, bathing, moving, walking.

settings.benefit_title: Low cost solution to prevent wandering danger
settings.benefit_desc_1: No subscription or service contract; just apply Patches when needed.
settings.benefit_desc_2: One Patch devices lasts for 30 days, with cover refresh every ten days.

settings.spec_desc: Batteries: Wedge has two AA-size lithium cells; Patch has one lithium coin cell.

settings.summary: Comfortable wearable Patch: not a removable bracelet, lanyard, or shoe insert.
Loud alarm instantly notifies if loved one wanders too far.
No impact to daily activities: discreet & waterproof.
Low cost: no Wi-Fi, no phone, no contract, no monthly service.

settings.product_desc: Alerta Get Started Kit includes wearable “Alerta Patch” (1-, 3-, or 6-month supply) and a handheld receiver, “Alerta Wedge.”  Patch is worn on upper back; Wedge alarms when Patch is out-of-range of Wedge.
